hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE '(rm -rf|git push --force|-f|force-push)'; then echo 'SECURITY: Dangerous command blocked. Confirm explicitly if needed.' && exit 2; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -q '\.env\.local'; then echo 'WARNING: Editing .env.local. Ensure sensitive values are not exposed.' && exit 0; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx)$'; then bun run dev > /dev/null 2>&1 & echo 'Dev server started in background'; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -qE 'components/.+\.tsx$'; then echo 'Running type check on components...'; bun typecheck components 2>&1 || true; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -qE 'app/api/.+\.ts$'; then echo 'Running type check on API...'; bun typecheck app/api 2>&1 || true; fi
